desc: 100% boost to Spark damage, probable Spark critical, Spark damage restores HP, Spark vulnerability infliction for 2 turns & 150% boost to Atk when Sparks exceed certain amount
lore:
A notched sword of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire, this blade radiates an impossible heat despite having no perceptible source.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects, a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail, it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field, if only to better understand its powers.
name: Marred Sword
